channel.title: App Password on Data Handyman
channel.description: Recent content in App Password on Data Handyman

item.title: Simple Gmail - part 1 and 1/2
item.description: That Darn App password Last time, in Simple Gmail - part 1, I talked about how I wanted Python to interact with Gmail so that data from the contact form could be organized. I really only went over how to provide the initial set up for Python/Gmail interaction. I didn’t like all of the set up that was required, and thought that I could automate this process. For the past couple of weeks, I have been working on a Python library called simplgmail.
